archimate:Principle.name: Make awareness content relatable
archimate:Principle.documentation:
Statement: Make awareness content relatable
Rationale: Content that is too abstract does not properly impact the audience, hence we should make the content we produce relatable to the target audience.
Impact: Look at ways of tying the content to the day-to-day of the audience, situations that they encounter, benefits that they will get from improved security, risks that affect their work if realized.
